parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (11240060) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Florin Barbur as a candidate for the REPER party in the Maramureș County for the Chamber of Deputies.  It clearly identifies a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies the "public" aspect of Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to support Florin Barbur and the REPER party. Phrases like "Votează poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot!" ("Vote position 10 on the ballot!") and "Te îndemn să votezi cu încredere partidul REPER" ("I urge you to vote with confidence for the REPER party") directly aim to influence voting behavior. This clearly fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post presents some biographical information about the candidate, its core message is explicitly promotional and persuasive, going beyond objective journalistic reporting. It lacks the neutrality and balanced presentation of facts expected in journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party. The content is clearly designed to sway voters, not simply share a personal viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2987748928057189</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Florin Barbur), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for REPER), and surpasses the boundaries of objective journalistic reporting. The presence of the CMF number further reinforces its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is also a crucial factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>FLORIN BARBUR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 2987748928057189) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui FLORIN BARBUR pentru Partidul REPER în județul Maramureș,  folosind fraze precum „Votează poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot!” și „Te îndemn să votezi cu încredere partidul REPER”, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatului și partidului menționat, în clară încălcare a prevederilor legale privind perioada de campanie electorală.  Prezența codului CMF 11240060 confirmă natura electorală a postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
